questions.title: 我们的成功归功于失败。
她的虚荣心让她成为了一个不受欢迎的人。
questions.answer: Her vanity results in becoming an unpopular person.

questions.title: 他的粗心导致他一生没有做成大事。
questions.answer: His carelessness results in achieving nothing all his life.

questions.title: 地震导致了经济危机。
questions.answer: The earthquake resulted in economic crisis.

questions.title: 这个妈妈的冲动导致了他的儿子离家出走。
questions.answer: This mother's impulsion results in her son leaving the house.

title: ——他的错误导致他被公司解雇了。
——这个后果太严重了。

answer.en: His mistake resulted in his expulsion from the company.

title: ——这个医生的失误导致他病人的死亡。
——他应该受到惩罚。

answer.en: That doctor's misplay resulted in his patient's death.
What is the reason for your coming?
My coming results from my loneliness.

title: ——他的懒惰导致了他这次考试不及格。
——太可惜了。他非常聪明，本可以轻松通过考试的。

answer.en: His laziness resulted in failing in the exam.
What a pity！He is very smart and could have passed the exam easily.
